content.p: Welcome to the XCSoar website. XCSoar is a tactical glide computer for the Pocket PC operating system. It runs on old hardware (PPC platform) through to WM2003SE. WM2005 will be supported when devices become available.

XCSoar is free software according to the GNU Public Licence. As such, you are free to download the source code, and we encourage input from users. Please use the sourceforge project page to submit bugs and request features.
We were using this yahoo mailing list for development and announcements. It is almost all done now via email communications to the sourceforge mailing lists
NOTE: pending the release of 4.5 - a new set of documentation has been added. The majority of this new documentation pertains only to version 4.5 which will be released in September 2005.
